K12D0476_H0442:516a-1: shr'i bha ga w'an ae ka dza ta ma h'a kalpa tantra r'a dza na ma /
K12D0476_H0442:516a-2: bod skad du; dpal bcom ldan 'das ral pa gcig
K12D0476_H0442:516a-3: pa'i brtag pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po zhes
K12D0476_H0442:516a-4: bya ba / bcom ldan 'das ral pa gcig pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0476_H0442:516a-5: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K12D0476_H0442:516a-6: bcom ldan 'das cang lo can gyi gnas rdo rje'i ri bo'i zom na bzhugs te /
K12D0476_H0442:516a-7: byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje dang /
K12D0476_H0442:516a-10: nyi ma dang zla ba'i gdong can dang /
K12D0476_H0442:516a-11: ye shes bkod pa'i phyag rgya la sogs pa byang
K12D0476_H0442:516a-12: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gsang ba'i de
K12D0476_H0442:516a-13: kho na nyid shin tu sbas pa'i mdzod la mnga'
K12D0476_H0442:516a-14: brnyes pa / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor du yang dag par nges pa /
K12D0476_H0442:516a-15: rigs dang tshogs dang dam tshig dang brtul zhugs chen
K12D0476_H0442:516a-16: po phyag rgya rgya mtsho lta bu'i tshul la gnas
K12D0476_H0442:516a-17: pa / gsang ba bas kyang ches gsang ba'i bde ba chen po la rnam par rol pa /
K12D0476_H0442:516a-18: thabs dang shes rab bla na med pa'i kha sbyor las nges par 'byung ba'i ye shes can /
K12D0476_H0442:516a-19: 'gro ba thams cad kyi kun nas sdang ba dang
K12D0476_H0442:516b-0: bag la nyal 'joms pa la mkhas pa dpag @516b
K12D0476_H0442:516b-1: tu med pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so //
K12D0476_H0442:516b-2: de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje stan las langs te /
K12D0476_H0442:516b-3: pus mo g-yas ba'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas
K12D0476_H0442:516b-4: thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
K12D0476_H0442:516b-5: ces gsol to // rdo rje dbang phyug rdo rje che //
K12D0476_H0442:516b-6: rdo rje'i rgyal po kun bdag po //
K12D0476_H0442:516b-7: sangs rgyas thams cad skyed mdzad yab //
K12D0476_H0442:516b-8: bde chen 'khor lo bdag la gsungs //
K12D0476_H0442:516b-9: srid gsum thibs po sel mdzad cing //
K12D0476_H0442:516b-10: mya ngan 'das la mi gnas pa //
K12D0476_H0442:516b-11: lus can kun skyob brtse chen po //
K12D0476_H0442:516b-12: 'dren pa khyod lam bstan du gsol; ;blo gros snying rje brtan ldan pas //
K12D0476_H0442:516b-13: thabs ni gang zhig mngon bsgoms na //
K12D0476_H0442:516b-15: gtso bo de ni 'dir bshad gsol //
K12D0476_H0442:516b-17: 'bum phrag rgyud chen las gsungs pa //
K12D0476_H0442:516b-18: ral pa gcig phreng dkyil 'khor gtso //
K12D0476_H0442:516b-19: sbas pa gang lags brtse bas gsungs //
K12D0476_H0442:516b-20: zhes gsol pa dang; bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dkyil
K12D0476_H0442:516b-21: 'khor ma lus pa'i bdag po rab tu dgyes pas
K12D0476_H0442:516b-23: zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer ba dog lnga phyung
K12D0476_H0442:516b-24: ste 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang ba byas
K12D0476_H0442:516b-25: te slar 'dus pas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yongs su
K12D0476_H0442:516b-26: sbyangs te bcom ldan 'das nyid la bskor ba lan
K12D0476_H0442:517a-2: de nas yang dbu'i gtsug tor gyi nor bu las
K12D0476_H0442:517a-3: zla ba dang kun de lta bu'i 'od zer dkar
K12D0476_H0442:517a-4: po byung ste dbu'i steng du dkyil 'khor chen po
K12D0476_H0442:517a-5: mngon par 'byung ba'i rnams par bkod pa mngon sum
K12D0476_H0442:517a-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'
K12D0476_H0442:517a-8: sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la 'di
K12D0476_H0442:517a-9: skad ces bka' stsal to; ;snying rje chen po khyod
K12D0476_H0442:517a-10: sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i
K12D0476_H0442:517a-11: phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor
K12D0476_H0442:517a-13: rdo rje sgeg pa chen po ral pa gcig pa'i gsang ba mchog zhus pa legs so legs so //
K12D0476_H0442:517a-18: khyod kyi snang bar byed pa yin no //
K12D0476_H0442:517a-19: nga yang sngon rdo rje ri bo'i zom 'di nyid
K12D0476_H0442:517a-20: du byang chub sems dpa' skar ma la dga' ba
K12D0476_H0442:517a-21: zhes bya bar gyur pa na de bzhin gshegs pa
K12D0476_H0442:517a-22: thams cad dang ye shes ral pa gcig pa'i gsang
K12D0476_H0442:517a-23: ba lhan cig tu rnam par rol pas sems can
K12D0476_H0442:517a-24: dpag tu med pa smin par byas pa rjes su
K12D0476_H0442:517a-25: dran no // de bas na khyod kyis snying rje
K12D0476_H0442:517a-26: chen po dang thabs la mkhas pas gsang sngags kyi
K12D0476_H0442:517a-27: nges par 'byung ba'i rtogs pa 'di legs par nyon
K12D0476_H0442:517a-28: la yid la zungs shig dang ngas khyod la bshad
K12D0476_H0442:517a-29: dran no // do // byang chub sems dpa' phyag
K12D0476_H0442:517a-30: na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa
K12D0476_H0442:517a-31: dran no // do // dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12D0476_H0442:517b-0: aom a'a: h'um aom a'a: hr'im tr'am @517b h'um: aom
K12D0476_H0442:517b-1: a'a: sarba ta tha ga to garbhe badzra ta tva
K12D0476_H0442:517b-2: sarba dzny'a na h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12D0476_H0442:517b-3: aom a'a:sarba ta th'a ga to m'a tri badzra ta tva b'a ya sa ra bam h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12D0476_H0442:517b-4: aom a'a: badzra dzny'a na h'um phat/
K12D0476_H0442:517b-5: aom a'a: badzra p'a ya h'um phat/
K12D0476_H0442:517b-6: aom a'a:badzra tsakra a'a h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12D0476_H0442:517b-7: aom a'a: badzra ratna ai h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12D0476_H0442:517b-8: aom a'a:badzra padma au h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12D0476_H0442:517b-9: aom a'a: badzra bi shva ae h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12D0476_H0442:517b-10: aom a'a: badzra mo ha aam h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12D0476_H0442:517b-11: aom a'a: badzra warnna a'i h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12D0476_H0442:517b-12: aom a'a: badzra r'a ga au h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12D0476_H0442:517b-13: aom a'a: badzra dve sha aee h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12D0476_H0442:517b-14: aom a'a: badzra: sth'i ra aoo h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12D0476_H0442:517b-15: aom a'a: badzra yo ga aam h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12D0476_H0442:517b-16: aom a'a: badzra dzva la aa h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12D0476_H0442:517b-17: aom a'a: badzra ba la a'a h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12D0476_H0442:517b-18: aom a'a: badzra r'u pa ni ka h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12D0476_H0442:517b-19: aom a'a: badzra shabda tsa h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12D0476_H0442:517b-20: aom a'a: badzra gandha ta h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12D0476_H0442:517b-21: aom a'a: badzra ra sa ta h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12D0476_H0442:517b-22: aom a'a: badzra sparshe pa h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12D0476_H0442:517b-23: aom a'a: badzra dharmma ya h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12D0476_H0442:517b-24: aom a'a: badzra kshe tra sha h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12D0476_H0442:517b-25: aom a'a:badzra a'a lo ka ksha h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12D0476_H0442:517b-26: aom a'a: badzra aam ku sha ri h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12D0476_H0442:517b-27: aom a'a: badzra p'a sha r'i h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12D0476_H0442:517b-28: aom a'a: badzra bam dhi li h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12D0476_H0442:517b-29: aom a'a:badzra ghanda li h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12D0476_H0442:517b-30: aom sva bh'a wa shuddha sarba dharm'a bha ba shuddhonyaham/
K12D0476_H0442:517b-31: aom badzra shuddha: sarbba dharma: badzra shuddhonyaham/
K12D0476_H0442:518a-0: aom yo ge shuddha: sarba dharm'a yo ga @518a *//
K12D0476_H0442:518a-2: shuddhonyaham/ rdo rje mi bskyod ral pa gcig /
K12D0476_H0442:518a-3: mi bskyod pa ni byang sems bcas //
K12D0476_H0442:518a-4: rdo rje sgron ma rdo rje dang //
K12D0476_H0442:518a-5: rdo rje zhags pa rnam par bsgom //
K12D0476_H0442:518a-6: gti mug bag chags 'dod chags dang //
K12D0476_H0442:518a-7: zhe sdang rdo rje 'khor lor gnas //
K12D0476_H0442:518a-8: ri rab nyi zla ba dan las //
K12D0476_H0442:518a-9: 'byung bzhi'i rdo rje de bzhin no //
K12D0476_H0442:518a-10: khyams bzhir me long pi wang dang //
K12D0476_H0442:518a-11: dri mchog zhal zas las byung ba //
K12D0476_H0442:518a-12: gzugs sgra dri ro rdo rje mo //
K12D0476_H0442:518a-13: mkhas pas rtag tu mnyam par gzhag /
K12D0476_H0442:518a-14: phyogs bral na bza' chos 'byung dang //
K12D0476_H0442:518a-15: mandal mar me las skyes pa //
K12D0476_H0442:518a-16: reg chos zhing dang snang ba yis //
K12D0476_H0442:518a-17: sgo bzhi lcags kyu zhags pa dang //
K12D0476_H0442:518a-18: lcags sgrog dril bu yongs gyur pas //
K12D0476_H0442:518a-19: rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs bsgom //
K12D0476_H0442:518a-20: rang mtshan ka p'a las rab mdzes //
K12D0476_H0442:518a-21: gtum drag tshang tshing 'khrigs pa dang //
K12D0476_H0442:518a-23: keng rus 'jigs rung shar sogs kyi //
K12D0476_H0442:518a-24: phyogs su g-yon bskor gyis legs gnas //
K12D0476_H0442:518a-25: ha har dgod pa dbang ldan du //
K12D0476_H0442:518a-26: byin zar dpal gyi nags tshal lo //
K12D0476_H0442:518a-27: mun pa mi bzad bden bral du //
K12D0476_H0442:518a-28: rlung du ki li ki lir sgrog /
K12D0476_H0442:518a-29: mi mnyam med pa zur bzhi yin //
K12D0476_H0442:518a-30: dran dang dbang po sgo bzhi ste //
K12D0476_H0442:518a-31: bsam gtan bzhi ni rta babs bzhi //
K12D0476_H0442:518b-0: rnam @518b thar brgyad phyir ka ba brgyad //
K12D0476_H0442:518b-1: byang chub yan lag bdun dag phyir //
K12D0476_H0442:518b-2: dra ba dang ni dra ba phyed //
K12D0476_H0442:518b-3: phyogs bzhir tshad med bzhi yin te //
K12D0476_H0442:518b-5: rnam par shes brgyad yongs dag pa //
K12D0476_H0442:518b-6: de ni dur khrod chen po brgyad //
K12D0476_H0442:518b-7: zla ba me long nyi mnyam nyid //
K12D0476_H0442:518b-8: sa bon mtshan ma kun tu rtog /
K12D0476_H0442:518b-9: yongs gyur bya ba grub pa ste //
K12D0476_H0442:518b-10: nyer rdzogs chos dbyings ye shes yin //
K12D0476_H0442:518b-11: lnga phung dang ni dri ma bzhin //
K12D0476_H0442:518b-12: chen po bzhi dang spyod yul brgyad //
K12D0476_H0442:518b-13: rnam bzhi tshor ba rnam dag lha //
K12D0476_H0442:518b-16: pu dza ao aa go ra de ma /
K12D0476_H0442:518b-17: ka ao tri ko ka la ka hi /
K12D0476_H0442:518b-18: pre gri soo su na si ma ku /
K12D0476_H0442:518b-19: ha hi hu he ho ham/
K12D0476_H0442:518b-20: aa ai au ae ao aam/
K12D0476_H0442:518b-21: rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par smin //
K12D0476_H0442:518b-22: rnam par 'joms dang rnam mtshan bral //
K12D0476_H0442:518b-23: dga' dang mchog dga' dga' bral dang //
K12D0476_H0442:518b-24: lhan cig skyes dga'i mtshan nyid do //
K12D0476_H0442:518b-26: bde chen dag phyir bum pa dang //
K12D0476_H0442:518b-27: gsang ba shes rab bde ba che //
K12D0476_H0442:518b-28: dbang bzhi rgyal po thob par 'gyur //
K12D0476_H0442:518b-29: dza: h'um bam ho: dmigs pas dub dang gzhan goms 'dod //
K12D0476_H0442:518b-30: rnam par mi rtog de nyid bsgom //
K12D0476_H0442:518b-31: rmi lam nam mkha'i sbyor ba ni //
K12D0476_H0442:518b-32: nyin mtshan rtag tu rnam par gzhag /
K12D0476_H0442:519a-1: bo snying ga lte bar ni //
K12D0476_H0442:519a-2: zla ba padma nyi steng du //
K12D0476_H0442:519a-3: ham dang h'um dang aa zhes pa //
K12D0476_H0442:519a-4: yi ge bde gsal mi rtog rgyud //
K12D0476_H0442:519a-5: snying po 'pho dang thim dang gnas //
K12D0476_H0442:519a-8: lus med sems can ci bder 'gro //
K12D0476_H0442:519a-10: dbang du byed dang kha sbyar bsgom //
K12D0476_H0442:519a-11: 'dun pas sgrub dang sa bon bsgyur //
K12D0476_H0442:519a-13: tshe 'di yi ni de bzhin du //
K12D0476_H0442:519a-14: nying mtshams sbyor dang srid mtshams yang //
K12D0476_H0442:519a-15: rnal 'byor rgyal po thabs ldan pas //
K12D0476_H0442:519a-16: bde chen sa gsum bde blag 'gro //
K12D0476_H0442:519a-17: srid bzhi dag dang nges pa dang //
K12D0476_H0442:519a-19: zhi rgyas dbang dang zhi la sogs //
K12D0476_H0442:519a-21: gnyis sbyor rgyun mi 'chad bde dang //
K12D0476_H0442:519a-22: kun nas 'od gsal lhan cig skyes //
K12D0476_H0442:519a-23: bung bas me tog rtsi ltar ni //
K12D0476_H0442:519a-24: rnam pa kun tu sgrub pa 'o //
K12D0476_H0442:519a-25: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharmma n'am aa dya nutpanna tvata sarbba ni sva bh'a ba h'um/
K12D0476_H0442:519a-26: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad bka' stsal pa dang /
K12D0476_H0442:519a-27: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na
K12D0476_H0442:519a-28: rdo rje lam sogs pa 'khor de dag thams cad
K12D0476_H0442:519b-0: rab tu yi rang ste tshigs su bcad pa @519b
K12D0476_H0442:519b-1: 'di dag gis mngon par bstod cing mchod pa bsam
K12D0476_H0442:519b-2: gyis mi khyab pa thams cad kyis mchod pa la
K12D0476_H0442:519b-4: 'jig rten mgon po bcom ldan legs //
K12D0476_H0442:519b-5: 'gro ba nyon mongs bskyab slad du; ;stong pa'i ting 'dzin spangs nas ni //
K12D0476_H0442:519b-6: khyod kyis byams chen skur bstan mdzad //
K12D0476_H0442:519b-7: thugs rje chen po bcom ldan legs //
K12D0476_H0442:519b-8: sems can sdug bsngal bsgral slad du //
K12D0476_H0442:519b-9: zhi ba'i mtha' la mi gnas par //
K12D0476_H0442:519b-10: brtse chen rnam par 'phrul bar mdzad //
K12D0476_H0442:519b-11: bde chen rgyal po bcom ldan legs //
K12D0476_H0442:519b-12: lus can bde don bsgrub slad du //
K12D0476_H0442:519b-13: zag med dbyings thugs ma gzhol bar //
K12D0476_H0442:519b-14: dgyes chen kun tu snang mdzad legs //
K12D0476_H0442:519b-15: gtso bo rdo rje rgyal po legs //
K12D0476_H0442:519b-16: skye bo dub pa ngal bso'i phyir //
K12D0476_H0442:519b-17: mtha' gcig rgyun chad mi bzhugs par //
K12D0476_H0442:519b-18: ma lus 'tshal ba sgrub pa rmad //
K12D0476_H0442:519b-19: de nas 'khor gyi tshogs phal po che de dag dang /
K12D0476_H0442:519b-20: rdo rje'i rigs kyi byang chub sems dpa' chen po
K12D0476_H0442:519b-21: de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di
K12D0476_H0442:519b-22: skad ces bka' stsal pa'i nges par gyur pa thabs
K12D0476_H0442:519b-23: dang shes rab bsam gyis mi khyab cing gzhal du
K12D0476_H0442:519b-24: med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas bzhin du thams
K12D0476_H0442:519b-25: cad byin gyi rlabs kyis sems can thams cad la
K12D0476_H0442:519b-26: phan gdags pa'i don du cho 'phrul chen po du
K12D0476_H0442:519b-27: ma bstan to // bcom ldan 'das kyis yang bka' stsal pa /
K12D0476_H0442:519b-28: gang la la zhig bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mi
K12D0476_H0442:519b-29: bskyod pa'i gsang ba chen po rgyud kyi rgyal po
K12D0476_H0442:520a-2: 'chang ba la sogs pa de dag ni nga dang rgyal ba thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro //
K12D0476_H0442:520a-3: rdo rje 'char ba khrag 'thung gi dkyil 'khor lha
K12D0476_H0442:520a-4: bye ba khrag khrig mang po yang de'i phyi bzhin
K12D0476_H0442:520a-6: dran pa tsam gyis tshe rabs thams cad du yi dam byed par 'gyur ro //
K12D0476_H0442:520a-7: mi'am mi ma yin pa la sogs pa'i gnod pa thams cad dang /
K12D0476_H0442:520a-10: bkra mi shis pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12D0476_H0442:520a-11: gang gi khyim na gnas pa de yang mchod rten du bya bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0476_H0442:520a-12: rig pa dang dngos grub thams cad kyi gter tshad med par 'gyur ro //
K12D0476_H0442:520a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K12D0476_H0442:520a-14: byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /
K12D0476_H0442:520a-18: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom
K12D0476_H0442:520a-19: ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do
K12D0476_H0442:520a-20: //// dpal bcom ldan 'das ral pa gcig pa'i brtag
K12D0476_H0442:520a-21: pa rdo rje'i rgyud chen po bla na med pa
K12D0476_H0442:520a-22: //// rdzogs so //// rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen
K12D0476_H0442:520a-23: po shr'i dzra ga ta mi tra a'a nanda'i bka'
K12D0476_H0442:520a-24: drin la brten nas rgya gar gyi pandi ta chen
K12D0476_H0442:520a-25: po badzra shr'i kha la ru tra dang /
K12D0476_H0442:520a-26: bod kyi lotstsha ba dge slong byams pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o //
